title: BlogDown
author: jamrizzi
description: BlogDown is a blazing fast frontend blogging platform that I built with Polymer. In fact, this very website is running on BlogDown.

title: Rizzi Guestbook
author: jamrizzi
description: Rizzi Guestbook is a WordPress plugin that creates a stunning guestbook or testimonial page using the built in WordPress comment system. It has had over 20,000 downloads.

title: ihaveaname
author: jamrizzi
description: I designed the landing page and made a promotional video for the #ihaveaname campaign, a campaign that was created to reduce the global demand of human trafficking by disrupting online communication utilized by traffickers to recruit clients and victims.

title: PodBuzzz WordPress Plugin
author: jamrizzi
description: This WordPress plugin that I built is the official PodBuzzz WordPress plugin.

title: J&C Orthotics
author: jamrizzi
description: This is a website that I built for J&C Orthotics and Prosthetics.

title: Hope Baptist Church
author: jamrizzi
description: This is a website that I built for Hope Baptist Church and Hope Christian School in Hanover, PA.

title: Americamry
author: jamrizzi
description: I built this website using a pre-alpha version of BlogDown.

title: A Jar of Smart Cookies
author: jamrizzi
description: I built this website using WordPress and designed the cookie logo for it.

title: Simply Global Designs
author: jamrizzi
description: I built this website using WordPress.
